summary: Completed frontend testing of Packs module dynamic item types and Maintenance customer search autocomplete. All 4 features tested successfully.

design_issues.issue: ESLint warning: useEffect has missing dependency 'loadData'

passed_tests: 1. Tariffs page loads with Packs/Combos tab - PASSED
2. Create Pack dialog shows ALL item types (default + custom) in dropdown - PASSED (17 types found)
3. Custom item types visible: Snowblade, Trineo, Esquí gama alta/media/superior, Tabla snowboard/gama alta/infantil, Esquí infantil, Bota esqui/snowboard/infantil - PASSED
4. Existing packs display custom item type labels correctly (e.g., 'Equipo gama media' shows 'Esquí gama media') - PASSED
5. Maintenance page loads with MI FLOTA / TALLER EXTERNO mode selector - PASSED
6. Customer search autocomplete works with name search ('Juan' returns 2 results) - PASSED
7. Customer search autocomplete works with phone search ('600' returns 3 results) - PASSED
8. Keyboard navigation (ArrowDown/ArrowUp/Enter/Escape) works in customer suggestions - PASSED
9. 'Nuevo Cliente' button opens new customer dialog from external repair form - PASSED
10. New customer creation works and auto-selects customer in repair form - PASSED
critical_code_review_comments: Minor: Maintenance.jsx line 97 - useEffect missing 'loadData' dependency (ESLint warning, not breaking)
seed_data_creation: Created 1 test customer: 'Test Customer Taller' (DNI: TEST12345X, Phone: 666777888)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Packs module now dynamically loads item types from /api/item-types API instead of hardcoded list. Customer search in Maintenance.jsx (Taller Externo) has full autocomplete with debounce (300ms), keyboard navigation, and option to create new customer inline. All features working correctly.
